mapper.update: UPDATE zx_gcsg_ct_contr_apply_works set isLeaf = '0', editTime = NOW(), isAssignable = '0' WHERE isLeaf = '1' and ct_contr_apply_works_id IN (select * from (SELECT DISTINCT parentID FROM zx_gcsg_ct_contr_apply_works WHERE ct_contr_apply_id = #{ctContrApplyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) as new_t ) AND ct_contr_apply_id = #{ctContrApplyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE zx_gcsg_ct_contr_apply_works set isLeaf = '1', editTime = NOW(), isAssignable = '1' WHERE isLeaf = '0' and ct_contr_apply_works_id not IN (select * from (SELECT DISTINCT parentID FROM zx_gcsg_ct_contr_apply_works WHERE ct_contr_apply_id = #{ctContrApplyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) as new_t ) AND ct_contr_apply_id = #{ctContrApplyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select ROUND((select sum(icw.contractPrice*icw.contractQty)/10000 from zx_gcsg_ct_contr_apply_works icw where icw.ct_contr_apply_id=ic.ct_contr_apply_id and icw.isLeaf=1),6) as contractAmt,
ROUND((select sum(IF(icw.taxRate = '' or icw.taxRate is NULL,0, icw.contractPrice*icw.contractQty/(1+icw.taxRate/100)))/10000 from zx_gcsg_ct_contr_apply_works icw where icw.ct_contr_apply_id=ic.ct_contr_apply_id and icw.isLeaf=1),6) as amtNoTax from zx_gcsg_ct_contr_apply ic where ct_contr_apply_id = #{ctContrApplyId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.delete: delete from zx_gcsg_ct_contr_apply_works where del_flag = '0' and ct_contr_apply_works_id in #{model.ctContrApplyWorksId}
mapper.select:
select round(sum(icw.contractPrice*icw.contractQty),2) as contractAmt,
round(sum(IF(icw.taxRate = '' or icw.taxRate is NULL,0, icw.contractPrice*icw.contractQty/(1+icw.taxRate/100))),2) as amtNoTax from zx_gcsg_ct_contr_apply_works icw where icw.del_flag = 0 and icw.isLeaf=1
and icw.treeNode LIKE CONCAT('%',#{treeNode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and icw.workNo LIKE CONCAT('%', #{workNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and icw.ct_contr_apply_id = #{ctContrApplyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
